task.title: Add a Call-to-action Button to an App (Limited Availability)
task.shortdesc: Add a Call-to-action button to drive conversion from UGC.

context.p: To add a Call-to-action button to an App:

step.cmd: Create a Mosaic or Media Wall App.

info.p: For information on the customizations available in a Mosaic or Media wall, see Mosaic Customizations or Media Wall Customizations.

step.cmd: Open the Designer for the App.
Scroll to the Call-to-Action Button section in the Designer.
